website_summaries.verdict: A waterproof boot that runs a bit small but keeps feet dry and doesn't break the bank.
pros: Quilted outer layer provides good warmth and still keeps out water
Tall shaft keeps more of the leg warm
cons: Narrow foot bed doesn't work for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these boots were exactly what I expected. I wore them while shoveling 30 inches of snow this weekend and my feet never got wet. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gluzband

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and warm
customer_reviews.text: I would order just half a size bigger than you normally wear, they almost fit as expected but if you want to wear warm socks with them you should go up a tiny bit. These boots are so cute and most importantly, they are very warm. On average lately it has been -15 outside so I have put them to the test. I like the rubber part around the foot so no slushy water soaks through. They ties easily and snuggly. Love the fuzz on top too.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Feels more like galoshes
customer_reviews.text: The foot part of these boots are more like galoshes in both the shape and material (rubber). There was not much support in them for your feet. In fact, the back end of the boots seemed to have deeper indents in the foot bed, so I was leaning backwards into the shoe and front part of my foot was higher. They looked fine, but did not seem suited for a lot of walking comfort wise. Also they run big, I wear 8.5 and got a 9 based on reviews and it was huge on me even with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: VM Lee

customer_reviews.title: No grip
customer_reviews.text: These boots have no support the inside is hard. Worst of all I almost fell in the subway station due to the boots not having any grip. The station was wet due to rain. These boots are not made for walking.the bottom is smooth I just hate to think what would have happened if it was snow or ice one ground. Definately not for NYC subway
customer_reviews.author: Redkissco

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BOOTS!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve looked for the right snow ❄️ boots for two winters now and and finally found the perfect boots! I only wish they had a zipper as well as the ties so they went on quicker and easier. They fit true to size, I am most always a size 10 and that’s what I ordered. There’s plenty of room for socks or if I’m only wearing trouser socks with dress slacks or a dress to work. The navy blue will match my light blue coat beautifully! I couldn’t be happier with my purchase! I recommend these boots highly!
customer_reviews.author: ChiMom20

customer_reviews.title: Caused blisters, but I found a different pair of Polar brand boots that don't!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these boots gave me blisters on the back of my heels after wearing them for just a few hours. I returned them to Amazon. I ended up ordering a different pair of Polar brand boots, and I absolutely love them. These are the boots I love (and don't give blisters!): Polar Womens Knitted Cardy Cuff Thermal Fur Lined Quilted Waterproof Tall Winter Snow Boots
customer_reviews.author: Proud mom in WA

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT!!!😍
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BOOTS! I ordered the grey boots in my regular size. They arroved quickly and I was in love when I opened the box. Then, imagine my surprise when they were not only FIERCE, but crazy comfortable. Also, the bottoms are rubber so when we went out in the sleet and slush. I got SO many compliments the first night (we went to a favorite local Atlanta club for a pajama party burlesque show, so there were TONS of people and my boots were NOTICED, lol) and I still get them. Have had them about 2 months and I am SO UPSET they are unavailable in my size in any other color b/c I need more!
customer_reviews.author: addie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these boots. They are fuzzy in the inside. Throughout the winter they kept my feet super warm. I never had cold toes. They are also at the perfect length to be able to walk around in deep snow and not have any snow fall into the boot. They are effective and fashionable. They are my favorite winter boots I’ve had to date and are defiantly worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Necole Fields

customer_reviews.title: Order full size up at least and plan to maybe need feet warmers if you'll be outside a while
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear an 8.5, so I got a 9 and my toes do touch the end... so I would order a full size up for sure! Maybe more. But they are so comfy and cute! I’ve been wearing them as shoes because in Wisconsin in winter it just makes more sense... now that I've had them a full year (so through two Wisconsin winters), I notice my feet do not stay warm. I dont wear them IN the snow for long amounts of time. So they aren't keeping my feet all that warm just going through parking lots or across a driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Bastien

customer_reviews.title: Ok- you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute winter boots at an affordable price, but you get what you pay for. I ordered a half size up and they are still quite snug, but the fur lining is super soft. Problems with the sizing and lack of arch support. Also, the boots are already starting to get creases in the vinyl area around the feet and ankles (and only have been worn a couple hours). Looks and feels very cheap. Not very durable. Would have rather searched sales at JcPenney or Kohls and got something better!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Troutt

customer_reviews.title: First pair
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these will work as this is my first pair of snowshoes The company put the shoes on sale right after I bought a pair which I think is low considering the shoes they gave me were not new they had grayish scuff marks and some kind of orange food on them however I do believe if you're getting these just to stay warm they are nice but just suggest you wash them first as it seems they do not care about cleanliness Hopefully you get them while the sale is on :)
customer_reviews.author: Renee E A

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.text: These are awful DO NOT BUY. My first time wearing the plastic in the back of the boot folded and cut the back of my ankle so much that it took not one but two band-aids to cover the cut. I don't think I can even fix the boot by removing that lining. Now that they're worn it's basically money wasted. Someone else complained of this problem and I regret not listening.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Such a great deal
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome! My friend and I both ordered a pair for a trip to the mountains this winter. We were a bit skeptical because they were only $15 but we were really surprised when they arrived. They look really nice, cute, and stylish. The stitching isn't perfect but for $15, no problem and it's not noticeable unless you're really looking for it. They kept our feet warm and dry through the snow all day. I normally wear a size 7 1/2. I ordered an 8 and they fit perfect! I ordered the tan nylon boots.
customer_reviews.author: Lace

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Boot
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boots at a great price, but the fit was off. I ordered a half size up (8) and the boot fit perfectly until I went to walk, and then my foot slid forward and my toes hit the front of the boot as if the boot was too small, but maybe it was too big? A painful fit but a beautiful boot. Sadly I have to return them but they were worth trying, and you should try them because this may not happen to you.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Only buy these if you have a NARROW foot. Wide feet, steer clear.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wide foot don't even bother, these are way too narrow and my feet are getting squished together on the sides. this is the correct size, but I don't even wanna know how bad my feet will be killing me after a mile of walking in these. And they look like they'd be better worn in the fall vs in a heavy winter like minnesota. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Lee

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is pretty accurate. The insole or padding felt as though it was a little shorter than the entire boot itself which made for an odd feeling when standing in them. They don't "crinkle" which is nice and what I look for in a boot. The stitching was already coming undone on the side right out of the box. I didn't chance wearing them in the rain or cold. I really wanted these to work however they got returned.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria boekeloo

customer_reviews.title: Great boots and holding up well
customer_reviews.text: I got these a year ago to wear while hunting. Hiking through slush, snow, and puddles my feet never got wet. I sat outside for hours and my feet never got cold. I was out for about half an hour during the polar vortex (wind chills below -50 and actual temp -30F) and my feet stayed warm. I recommend these to anyone and everyone looking for boots. I planned on tossing them after hunting season because I figured they would be destroyed. Instead, they still look brand new when I wipe the mud off.
customer_reviews.author: Akim

customer_reviews.title: Form but no Function, not for cold weather!
customer_reviews.text: While the product looked good and felt good on the foot, the insulation factor was lacking however. The weather was in the 30's to upper 20's and we walked on hard packed snow part of the time. The other time there was no snow same temperatures, just paved ground. Tried both single layer of socks and multiple layers. Neither kept feet warm. These have form but no function when it comes to cold weather. Better off buying a thinsulate lined product or similar.
customer_reviews.author: Jabo_man

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit for price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these boots for a last minute trip to the snow. Living in Vegas we have no need for a good winter boot. Wore these boots 3 days in 9 degree weather and even hiked in them. I went up half a size due to other reviews I had read but think I would have been fine in a 8.5 (I ordered 9’s). I wore them with my regular socks and my feet were the warmest part of my body. I have large calf’s and even some wide calf boots do not fit the fit pretty well and I was still able to tie them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: I've spent hundreds of dollars looking for a warm boot never succeeding brands like Keene, Columbia, Sorel. I live at 10,000 ft. .warm was important. My husband found these for me and they by far the cheapest! I highly recommend if you want warm feet for little while anyways. That saying you pay for what you get isn't always the case. Rated a 4 cause kept warm for short period but much longer than any of the rest. $500 later....found under $50!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I have already had a pair of these boots, and after 3 years of constant wintertime use, they are just now starting to crack on the dorsum of the foot. As we all know, this is the weak spot of any footwear, and I love them so much that I bought this new pair to have next winter! These boots are high enough to keep snow out as I do outside chores, and the grip is great even in the slipperiest conditions of mud, rain and snow. I trust that my new pair will provide me with fabulous warmth next year, as the pair I use daily now still keeps me warm!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Johnston

customer_reviews.title: So warm! And very cute snow boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd pair of Polar boots and so far I’m very pleased with my experience with this brand. I had ordered these just in time before we got hit with a few more snow storms and I’m so thankful I did. They’re tall enough and very well insulated. I had ordered the ‘pleather’ kind thinking it’d be most practical so that the snow and wet weather could just roll off of them easily and not to mention wayyyy easier to keep clean. I haven’t had them long yet but seems like they’re still holding up just as good as the first day I got them. I would definitely recommend Polar brand boots!
customer_reviews.author: Ayvee

customer_reviews.title: Size is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I like how the boot looks in the photo what I dislike is the plastic look, I were a a size 10 so I ordered a size 10 the boot size is incorrect and the boot itself is very wide and bulky at the foot so my toe is at the front of the boot which hurts their is no size half so I'm afraid to order a size 11 and be back at the option to return so I can't put my finger on this product but it's size isnot the size and it looks very fake
customer_reviews.author: D.M.CH

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for snow boots and a co-worker mentioned this brand to me. So far I've been pleased with the seller and the product. Boots arrived next day and fit to perfection. They have a good rubber sole and fur inside entire boot. Waiting for a good snow fall to put them to the test. I'll be buying another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: EnidT

customer_reviews.title: Best boots for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews but these boots are simply amazing. They are extremely water resistant and warm. I live out in the country and I go through boots a lot So I need something reliable. My foot sake almost to the top of these boots in muck and my foot remained completely dry. I was even able to wash the boots off on the outside with the inside never getting wet because of the way that the boots are sealed even around the laces. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these during a trip to Minnesota when they got 1 foot of snow. My feet stayed warm! Snow doesn't get in, even while crawling through the snow to build a snowman. Highly recommend for the price. Might need to add an insole as the one it comes with is pretty hard, but I traveled through airports without discomfort. After reading all the reviews about how small these run, I was surprised that my normal size fit. I ordered the sweater fabric one.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Yes, summer just ended, but I wanted to get the jump on winter and at this price, I couldn't pass up these boots. Very stylish on the outside and the inner lining will keep me very warm. Glad I ordered up a size. I usually wear an 8 in sneakers, but with boots, best to err on the side of caution because and sure enough, the 9 gives me just enough space to wiggle my toes. ;) Quality shoe: no bits of glue are visible, no frayed threads on the upper construction.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fawbush

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and very affordable
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant because of the low price, and I only recently threw out my prior Uber cheap boots that had a lot of issues. These are amazing! They’re fully lined with faux fur and despite multiple walks with the dog, these were comfy and kept my feet warm the whole time. My old pair always pulled my sock off when I pulled my feet out, and I don’t seem to have that issue with these. I had wanted the leather, but got the “suede” because it was sold out. I was afraid the salt and sand on the roads would discolor them, but they still look pretty fabulous. Really great buy.
customer_reviews.author: SprinklyDonut

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Boot
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the NE U.S. and used these boots for two winters now. They've performed well! My only con is that after walking a good distance my legs get tired because the boots are relatively heavy. Aside from that they're an excellent winter boot and are durable, I wouldn't let the weight con discourage you unless you're looking at these for winter hiking or movement heavy winter activities.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for an upcoming trip to Quebec. They are very warm and the entire boot is covered with filling so you entire foot from toes to calf will be warm. The tongue of the boot is sown into the boot so it should minimize any water leak. The rubber sole is very flexible and feels nice on the feet. Im normally a size 9 and bought them a size 10 and with thick socks they feel great! Will update review once I put these puppies to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Lyd Marie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for $$$
customer_reviews.text: Got the Polar boots couple a days ago and overall I like the boots for the price. I wear an 8, got an 8 and they fit as expected. The white boot has contrasting whites due to the material used. But they are warm and I could personally do without the fur at top And the waterproof area is a little shiny/pleather look which I’m not a big fan of, but I like the boots and hope they wear nice in rain/snow weather this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised: durable, waterproof, and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots. I live in the mountains at about 7000 feet so we get snow quite frequently. These are the best boots I've ever owned after living here for over 9 years! They're comfortable and I have yet to get any water that soak through. They have really good traction, just make sure you're really form when trying to get the snow off the bottom before going indoors. I would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Warm enough for miles of walking in the snow.
customer_reviews.text: The boots did what they were intended to do. Kept my feet warm and dry in the snow. Be aware they come small . I normally wear 9 1/2 sometime 10. I ordered size 10 I had to reorder these in a size 11 to be comfortable and walk without my feet being squished. When I first wore them some if the inside fur fuzz stuck to my white socks but no discoloration noted. Great boots.
customer_reviews.author: claudia p.

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Just received them and immediately printed a return label. I really did like them but they run way too large and the color is definitely not as shown. I’m about 5.5 ordered a 6 any was swimming in them even with inserts. In the picture the grey looks very dark but in person looks like a grey crayons crayon. I would definitely reorder a size down if the the one color I want wasn’t always out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, and she loves them. She is 11 years old and so far they seem to be holding up well to her playing. She says that they are super comfortable, and her feet stay warm and dry in the snow. For the price even if they last just one winter, which she probably will outgrow them anyway, I say they were definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price range!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! I am a size 8 and the 8 fits pretty true. I can see why people say they are a little snug but they fit me just fine and any bigger would be loose and sloppy. They aren't high-quality, leather boots but they are cute and I've been asked twice if they are Sorels. Michigan winter has been pretty dry so far, but the puddles and the rain haven't permeated the boot yet. I'm taking them to Canada next week so we will see how they hold up. Overall, you can't beat the $30 price tag for a decent pair of boots! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: She did not wear this boot for more than 5 times and I do not think she is going to use it again because of this poor sewing.
customer_reviews.text: My wife was complaining from a pain caused by this boot for the past four months. Every time she wears it, a pain her upper foot "instep" where her talus bone is located. I was not paying attention until I notice she avoids to wear those boots. Only then, I checked the boot from inside and I discovered a big chunk of plastic covered by the fur. She did not wear this boot for more than 5 times and I do not think she is going to use it again because of this poor sewing.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz alobud

customer_reviews.title: Wore once
customer_reviews.text: I received my boot right before a big storm in Ma I only wore them once and they look like I have worn them all winter they look worn and used, the fold that you see is already rubbing on the top of my foot ans is uncomfortable .not happy with narrow size . their is no support but I guess for the price I should have expected that . Just not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bad kitty

customer_reviews.title: I just wore these terrific boots for 2 days straight
customer_reviews.text: I just wore these terrific boots for 2 days straight, in the snow and freezing cold weather. I ordered a size 7 to make room for thick socks. I am ordinarily a size 6 1/2. They fit well. The fur lining made my feet feel cozy and warm, even as I shoveled the snow and walked in it. Well insulated. I definitely recommend these boots; so glad I got them. The only reason I gave them 4 stars instead of 5 is that they are new and so I want to see how they hold up this winter season. I may come back to this review and update.
customer_reviews.author: Raanan Shefa

customer_reviews.title: Great price, outstanding boot.
customer_reviews.text: It has already been very cold, wet and all the yuck weather you can imagine, where I live. These boots have kept my feet warm and dry and comfortable beyond what I was hoping. And what a fantastic price. I checked out similar brands that were not even as comfortable and they were on sale for $169!! I am tempted to buy another pair. And they are cute too!!
customer_reviews.author: Katy JK

customer_reviews.title: Nice but NO TRACTION!
customer_reviews.text: Looked great & loved them until i tried them on. The right foot was uncomfortable, there was something sticking out into my foot. I wasn't able to wear four more then 5 min. There slippery too, i walked into my garage & almost slipped & fell. I'd like winter boots that look decent but keep my feet dry & warm as well as help keep me on my feet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Z-Doll

customer_reviews.title: Cute with little warmth
customer_reviews.text: While these are definitely cute, they lack in the warmth and water proof categories. If your goal was is to wear them for short periods (15minutes or less) outside they're great. However if you need something warm while shoveling snow, walking the dog etc they fall short. Even with thick winter socks my feet get cold quickly. While I would describe them as water resistant, they are NOT water proof. Size wise, I'm usually a solid 10.5 at Amazon recommendation I ordered 11. They could be a smidgen longer as I need to layer socks.
customer_reviews.author: kbswhrmm

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots to walk my dog on gravel roads when I moved to the mountains. Having just moved from south florida I was concerned about getting cold feet, literally. These boots are awesome. Roomy, durable, comfortable and warm with good arch support. Sometimes I'm too lazy to go upstairs for socks. The furry lining feels great even barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Cheap worthless boots
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for an hour and had to take them off. On one side, the back of the boot developed a crease that would stab at the back of my leg as I walked, and I couldn't wear them again. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Had pretty good traction and kept my feet and legs warm
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I wasn't sliding around while walking in snow and in danger of falling on my face. Had pretty good traction and kept my feet and legs warm. Had a bit of a problem with pinching around my ankles as the leather bent/stretched as I moved so hopefully it's just a matter of breaking it in. I like the lace up part so I can slide the boots over my pants with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: RDV

customer_reviews.title: Slip n slide
customer_reviews.text: If I'm not mistaking, I read in the description that these boots were slip resistant or something to that affect. I just slid thru my kitchen on my eway out the door. I ordered a 10, they sent a 9.
customer_reviews.author: CMoan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable boots with poor construction :(
customer_reviews.text: These boots arrived and are so cute out of the box. I immediately tried them on and the first attempt to lace them , the metal ring popped out of the faux suede loop holding it. With very little effort it just came unstitched and now they won’t lace up! Very poor cheap construction for paying even $45 I expected more. They are so cute I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rexrode

customer_reviews.title: These boots were made for mud & winter seasons.
customer_reviews.text: My drive way is dirt.. imagine mud season for me 😒 these boots are made with a rubber top so the mud slides off & nothing gets in due to them coming a little under my knee.. I just rinse them off & they look new! Winter brings this boot to a new level.. the grips on the bottom are exceptionally grooved out so I don’t slip.. all the way around you’ll find.. comfort.. warmth & safety.. not forgetting.. easy to clean off.. it’s a.. win.. win!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 9 in black and a 10 in black the 9 was a little small but loved the 10 arrived in brown not black as expected but she did not care about the color the fit was better and she has been wearing them ever since, she is a just turned 13 year old girl!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danswer7

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I work at an elementary school and have morning duty every day. It can get pretty cold out there! These boots keep my feet warm and toasty. No water seeping in when it rains either. Best part is I have had so many compliments on them! Parent dropping off their kids even commented on how nice they look. My only complaint is that the boot material on the calf part has folded down a little and rubs my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Style Meets Durable Warm Boots
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE everything about these boots. Their style, comfort, and quality. I wore them with jeans, leggings, all summer. Perfect color and the baby blue laces add style. Keep my feet warm driving the kid to school, and if I stepped in crap, you can literally spray them off!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but way too narrow for wide feet !!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute , cute boots. Unfortunately, way too tight fir my size 8.5 wide feet. My girlfriend loved them, so I gave them to her. But cute , cute and warm shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs half size small
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! I wear a 7.5 but like extra room in the toe area so I ordered 8. These fit pretty snug on my foot, no wiggle room for the toes and no way could I double up on socks. But they are comfy and really warm, and completely adorable. I live in the Midwest and see a fair amount of snow and slush this time of year, so we’ll see how well they hold up through the muck.
customer_reviews.author: @billiter

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The boots are cute, my daughter loves them. However after only wearing them 4 or 5 times there are places where the sole meets the sides where the rubber is beginning to split in the seam. That is disappointing to see, especially because she is 14 and it isn't like she is rough on them.
customer_reviews.author: Surgery_Girl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE These Boots
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable boots I have ever owned. Soft and warm inside, comfy fit, I get a ton of compliments, and they are great for rainy days or just cold days. Recommend a half-size larger if you wear thick socks under your boots. Expects lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Akitatwo

customer_reviews.title: Right boot seems defective.
customer_reviews.text: The left boot is comfortably, the right boot is the most uncomfortable boot I have ever had on my feet, my ankle throbs for hours after wearing them for a short period of time. They are very cute and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Not tall boots if youre looking tall. But nice.
customer_reviews.text: While we do like these boots We think these boots are NOT TALL as seller stated in the description. Buyer beware only if your 3- 4ft are they tall. If you were expecting your legs to be protected all way up, They wont be. Not happy abt how sellers mislead for profit.
customer_reviews.author: k t

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair Of Boots.
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots for my daughter, for a weekend trip to a ski resort (elevation around 10,000ft). Before we left, we took a trip up to Mt Lasson (elevation about 8,500 ft) to try them out. We wanted make sure they were going to keep her warm and dry. She had absolutely no complaints. She loves the look of them, and the fuzzy inside lining. They kept her feet dry and warm. Even after spending about 45 minutes with her feet barried in deep deep snow.
customer_reviews.author: DarthYoda

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly warm, comfortable, and durable front laces to ensure a tight fit. Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly. There's no wiggle room to cause blistering, but it's not too snug to cause cramping. Thin and thick socks are wearable due to the high quality of the front laces.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Stylish Snow Boots
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet warm and dry. They're also cute and stylish. And they're lightweight so great for packing and traveling. Used them for a trip to Denver in December 2016. There was a huge snow storm the day before I arrived to Denver so there was tons of snow in the ground that I walked through and the traction was good. I also wore them to a Broncos football game and there was a ton of snow on the ground so when we were at our seats you had no choice but to leave your feet in the cold snow...these were great! They kept my feet dry and warm during the entire game!
customer_reviews.author: SollyE

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.  If you are buying for use in the snow, don't
customer_reviews.text: The soles of these boots collect ice balls and snow to the botom of you feet, it is like walking on snowball stilts. You would think this would mean they had good traction, they don't. Threads have also started to come out of the souls. These boots are not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ones ever
customer_reviews.text: My size is 7 1/2 and I bought a size 8 because I like wearing thick socks. I don't need to wear thick socks with these boots, however it fits JUST RIGHT. Remember to get half size bigger, or even a whole size, if you like wearing thick socks!! But other than that, I love it. Comfy, warm and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Natassja Schapochnicof

customer_reviews.title: Odd fitting bottoms for my foot
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on and the soles of my feet didn’t touch the bottom. They balanced on my toes and heel and on the very outside. It was an odd feeling, I’ve never tried shoes on that felt like that.
customer_reviews.author: Daniell911

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Super warm. Super cute snow boots I dont live in a climate where I need them everyday. But I had no problem walking around Tahoe and to the lake from hotel in these. No foot pain or blisters Just super warm comfy boots.
customer_reviews.author: Elysha L Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, poorly made, overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: They are very thin, I’m guessing they will provide zero warmth. Cheaply made, not worth the price. The lining sticks to your heel when you pull it out which inevitably will rip and ruin the inside of the boot. Returning these. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: D.Bass

customer_reviews.title: Received two right feet!! Too small!
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually fuming. I received two RIGHT foot boots. The sizing is off as well. I wear a nine and these are too tight. Also came with a filthy faded obviously used dust bag and the shoes weren’t even in it. And to top it off the shoes are dirty! Disgusting Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: MY second pair of these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up, and they fit much better! I’ve ordered a few pairs, for me and my mom. Hers fit perfect no issues, but my right boots was kind of snug. By not so much it hurt my foot, just not toe wiggle approved. I’d order a size up for us long toe crew.. lol!! Otherwise the boots kept me warm and puddles were no problem for the boots. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MartyMarrr

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I got these for our winter Colorado vacation. Overall they kept my feet moderately warm. I wore wool socks with them, but when the temps were hovering around zero, my feet did get a bit cold. We walked miles and miles all over Breckenridge and they kept my feet completely dry. I do wish they had a bit of support in them as my feet were tired from walking. However, these aren't listed as walking boots, so I wasn't expecting them to have lots of support. When I use them again, I will put inserts in them. They are super cute and overall I really liked them!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots they are super warm and thus far ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots they are super warm and thus far have kept my feet dry just trudging thru normal snow going to and from the car or shoveling. I haven't spent long long periods of time in the snow so i'm not sure how they'd hold up then for dryness. Also they are very slippery on ice for a snow boot so becareful if its extra icy where you'll be walking.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Warm - Order Up
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful well made and lightweight. Runs s little small recommending you order a size up. Warm soft plush lining at a low price looking like more expensive boots. Purchased in different colors different styles great company .
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Runs uncomfortably small
customer_reviews.text: Too small to be comfortable. They’re hard toe and have good traction in snow. I waited too long to return them, so I’m stuck with them. They’re too small/tight to wear. I ordered a 10, but should have gone up a size or two
customer_reviews.author: missyj95

customer_reviews.title: Won't Be Wearing Again Any Time Soon
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to the product. Once I got it did not like all to much. I felt like I had no ankle support. The side of shoes kept rubbing up against my pinky toe. The back of the boots rubbed against back of ankle so bad it left a bruise. It might just have to break them in but won't be wearing them anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mercades Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Awkward ankle fit- but good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Warm, fuzzy. The ankle portion is awkward though- like SUPER wide compared to the foot and calf parts so when you lace it up it makes it a little uncomfortable. I'm hoping as they break in this resolves itself. For the price though, they are a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa R

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price
customer_reviews.text: I got a size 10 and where to small even my size 10 shoe insoles wouldn't fit. I returned them and got the size 11 and they fit as if they were a size 10 which is perfect for me. They keep my feet warm and I'm not sure how well they will do in the rain and snow. I live in the Pacific Northwest and it is usually very rainy so we will see you soon and will update. Feb 13 finally got snow my boots did great my feet stayed dry, a little cold even with 2 pairs of socks but they did what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: machinetender

customer_reviews.title: So far I love them
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered a size 10, when they arrived they were a tad tight. I know I’d be wearing thicker socks. So returned them and ordered a Sz 11. Which fit way better. I bought them for our up coming winter in Alaska. So once I can wear them out in snow I’ll update my review. But I love the style of the boots, upon arriving the boots looked in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fat Feet Welcomed
customer_reviews.text: Full boot review: I have a fat foot and these boots have ample space. They do not cut across the top of my foot where I feel my foot is suffocating much less cutting of circulation. The boots runs a little small (I'm 9.5, ordered a 10 and happy I did). I have put them to the test and wore them out in the rain and walked into puddles of water. My feet were warm and dry. They are stylish (per say) and have received several compliments from friends and strangers alike.
customer_reviews.author: PhatnPhabulous

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these boots a 5 except for the slightly snug fit. They are about a 1/2 size smaller than expected. A 10 is the largest shoe size I wear and then ONLY in a boot, with very thick socks. These are 10s and 11s swallow me whole. They are too snug for a thick sock so here's hoping I won't need a thick sock! Otherwise, they are stunningly beautiful for snow boots! They look and feel like boots that cost over $100. Very comfy, lined throughout. Can't wait for snow!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boots are very pretty and well made
customer_reviews.text: I got this right before leaving for snow trip, so I couldn't exchange it. Boots are very pretty and well made. But they are extremely wide (like WW) and a bit too long. I had to wear thick hand-made socks to prevent my foot from sliding inside the boot, and even with those socks walking wasn't comfortable. But if I got a smaller size, my big toe wouldn't have enough space...
customer_reviews.author: N. Neymark

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves them. We did order a half size up to make room for wool socks... beautiful, comfortable, and super warm! She wears a 9, ordered 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: October Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews and they all were good, so I ordered them too
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and they all were good, so I ordered them too, THANK you to the other who ordered these boots and posted how good and warm they are. They do Keep your feet DRY, WARM! I have a very bad back where I'm in chronic pain 24/7 & take pain pills 24/7, most shoes/boots will make my back hurt, thankfully these boots are wonderful and I can wear them without causing more pain.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Heilman

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful and warm. I didn't expect to hike a waterfall the first time I wore them, and my feet were dry and warm the whole time. I cannot say I enjoyed the limited arch support, but since I was putting them to a hiking test, not a snowy day test... I don't blame the boots!
customer_reviews.author: Christina W.

customer_reviews.title: Snow saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a ski/snowboarding trip and they were a life saver! They kept my feet warm and prevented any water from getting in. They are nice to wear when going out during winter with snow or to do fun snow activities.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not very comfortable in the heel area...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, and decently warm for the morning kid to school drop off.. I really wanted to like these, first time wearing they hurt my heels, thought they just needed to broke in .. two weeks later they still hurt my heels.. not a size issue either, just where the two materials meet, it’s rubbing inside..
customer_reviews.author: Wheelie Dealie

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow!
customer_reviews.text: These have been a great snow shoe for my daughter this winter. She loves the way they look which is hard to achieve with her changing fashion sense. I love that they keep her feet warm and her toes have room and no discomfort has been reported. These are not great in puddles or deep mud as they do not have wrap around coverage for water proofing.
customer_reviews.author: jhmom

customer_reviews.title: ... but i took a chance because my moms ran like half a size too big
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the boot with the expectation that the width (11B) would probably not work for me but i took a chance because my moms ran like half a size too big. Unfortunately this boot doesnt exceed a size 11 but i can tell its abreally good boot. The faux fur is lined all the way thru to the toes and its not bulky or clunky. For anyone thay can get the right fit, youve got a good boot on your hands
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Cute, warm but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Cute boot. Lots of compliments. Warm and comfortable. Great for a weekend trip. After wearing for 3 months (an hour a day mostly to walk the dog) the boot is showing a great deal of wear. Upper material is cracking, rings rusting and leaking a great deal. I know it is a cheap boot but I had hope they would last for at least one winter. Here in SC we have moderate winters so I was hopeful but was disappointed in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole N

customer_reviews.title: A bit boujee
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping to use them for snow shoeing this year and quickly returned them. Nothing against the product necessarily, just totally not my style whatsoever. Kind of "boujee" for my simple woodland taste. Just a note: The fit was a bit tight but it was the style that made me return.
customer_reviews.author: Korie Bendza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to review these boots. I absolutely love them! They fit perfectly. They are warm and water proof. I only got to wear them once last winter. I received them at the end of the season. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BOOT!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots!! The fit is great, I wear a 7.5 and ordered that size. I wear thicker socks with my winter boots and there was plenty of room. The design is cute with the fur top and rubber bottoms. I wore these in the snow and my feet were warm and dry. I love these so much that I ordered a couple more in different colors!! Great boot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki P

customer_reviews.title: Warm, waterproof, pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect winter boot, I’ve used the same pair for five winters now. First three winters, completely waterproof but now it leaks a little when you step in a big puddle or trudge through snow for a long time. Really warm too, I plan to get another of the same pair for next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Smith

customer_reviews.title: Runs SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Definitely too small. I’d recommend ordering a full size up. I wear an 8.5 and ordered a 9 and they’re way small. Other than that they look great and I like them enough I’ll exchange mine for next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! These boots were perfect for my trip to NYC, they are comfortable to walk all day, keep you warm, and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny R

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice quality and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: These arrived exactly the day they were supposed to. They are very nice quality and nice looking, and love that they are lined all the way through. When I first put them on, they were a bit snug because I usually order an 11w. I've been wearing them today for about and hour and a half and they are loosening up a bit I'm not sure how warm they will be in the snow, but I will find out in about a week. I would definitely recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

customer_reviews.title: Good with 1 issue
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 so I had to buy a 9. There is a part of the boot inside that covers the heel. It digs uncomfortably into the back of my leg. I believe I can remedy the issue by wearing leg warmers to put a cushiony layer between the boot and my leg. Otherwise, the boots are great.
customer_reviews.author: LadySoul

customer_reviews.title: SMALL but cute boots.
customer_reviews.text: These are a full size too small. I typically wear a 9.5/10, and thought a 10 would be roomy enough. WRONG. My toes touched the toe of the shoe in thin sport socks. Sucks, because today we got a couple inches, and they would have come in handy. They were immediately noticeably warm once I slid my foot in, so I reordered a size 11, and hopefully they fit because they are cute boots that I think will help with these WV winters. I got the tan suede boots fwiw.
customer_reviews.author: Me!

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on a larger end of my shoe size since I knew I’d wear them with socks. They were WAY too tight for comfort. Felt at least a whole size too small. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: swtnss

customer_reviews.title: Were perfect, too bad my daughters huge foot grew way ...
customer_reviews.text: Were perfect, too bad my daughters huge foot grew way too fast. We used them for two winters and they stayed in perfect condition. Tall, the fur goes all the way to the ankle, warm, kept her foot dry. They were really good. For a kid I don't know that I would buy them again because they grow so fast that it is a high price to pay for a shoe you may not used much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s a great boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far these are pretty great, though as soon as they arrived our weather changed and I haven’t needed to wear them... I did notice the exterior material on the foot/toe region (pleather? Vinyl?) creased when I took a few steps where the shoe naturally needs to bend. The color of this new crease is a shade or two lighter than the rest of the boot but for $15 I’m not going to complain about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ris Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Really soft
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and keeps feet warm. Toes get cold, though I am in Wisconsin so it is unusually cold here this year. I can slide them on or tighten them with the laces. They seem to work on ice well and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Short

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, just got them today so haven't tried in snow but love them! I just selected "black" for the color option and it is a quilted nylon type fabric which I was hoping for. I have bigger calves and they fit well, wish they were a bit wider even at the top laces, but I know my calves are wide. So glad I took a chance on these! Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A.

product_meta.title: Polar Women's Nylon Tall Winter Snow Boot
product_meta.description:
Polar's cold weather footwear are a must have essential of the winter wardrobe. Ideal casual outdoor footwear for those cold winter days and suitable for those participating winter activities. This mid calf pair has a lace up design and fully lined interior. The calendered slip resistant rubber sole unit gives extra protection against the winter elements. The colour coded outsole is iconic and this boot is available in a palette of fashionable shades and upper materials.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :15.7 x 11.4 x 4 inches; 2.2 Pounds
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :June 4, 2015
 * ASIN :B00YUR9GIQ

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #58,385 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #27855 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #100 inWomen's Mid-Calf Boots 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:5.0 out of 5 stars8 ratings Polar's cold weather footwear are a must have essential of the winter wardrobe. Ideal casual outdoor footwear for those cold winter days and suitable for those participating winter activities. This mid calf pair has a lace up design and fully lined interior. The calendered slip resistant rubber sole unit gives extra protection against the winter elements. The colour coded outsole is iconic and this boot is available in a palette of fashionable shades and upper materials.
feature_bullets: Available in a palette of fashionable shades
